Alice Rawsthorn OBE (born 1958 in Manchester) is a British design critic and author. Her books include Design as an Attitude (2018) and Hello World: Where ...
Alice Rawsthorn ... She is a co-founder with Paola Antonelli of the Design Emergency project to investigate design's role as a force for positive change.
